g.text: Literature research, existing projects review
Preliminary design of a full processing pipeline
Selection of most relevant software tools
Proposal presentation
Setting up the code environment for experiments
Setting up of hardware system for experiments
Conducting experiments focused on data exploration
Selection of control gesture set
Optimizing EMG and IMU sensors positioning, determining the need for signal conditioning
Investigation of EMG sensors capabilities in regards to reliable, time-consistent data transmission
Testing data streaming from multiple EMG sensors
Verification of data received from full set of EMG sensors / determining its readiness for further processing
Verification of data received from IMU sensors
Ensuring synchronization between IMU and EMG sensors data streams
Finalizing the pre-processing pipeline and software tools selection
Finalizing gesture set selection
Implementation of chosen feature extraction method for EMG, experimenting with alternatives
Implementation of IMU data feature extraction
Attempting EMG and IMU feature fusion
Evaluation and selection of best performing feature extractor for chosen gesture set
Experimenting with pre-chosen classifier and experimenting with alternatives
Selection of best-performing classifier
Finalizing the full processing pipeline
Classifier training
Implementation of simulation interface
Running SITL tests with command-based control
Setting up the drone for experiments
Running HITL tests with a drone
Project presentation
